name: Infinicactus
description:
Grow your cactus infinitely! Grab the water drops to enhance growth while avoiding the insects that prevent it!

Instructions: 

  • Press ArrowKeys, or WAD to grow into that direction.
  • Quick play from the menu by pressing Spacebar.

Credits:
